parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "spack",
  "details": {
    "scheduler": "slurm",
    "spack_version": "0.17.3",
    "spack_instance_name": "cpu",
    "spack_instance_dir": "/cm/shared/apps/spack/0.17.3/cpu",
    "spack_package": "nvhpc@21.3",
    "spack_compiler": "gcc@11.2.0",
    "spack_variants": "+mpi",
    "spack_dependencies": "",
    "spack_spec": "nvhpc@21.3 % gcc@11.2.0 +mpi ",
    "resource_requirements": {
      "nodes": 1,
      "tasks_per_node": 1,
      "cpus_per_task": 8,
      "time": "01:00:00",
      "partition": "hotel-gpu",
      "account": "sys200"
    }
  }
}
```

This script is using the `spack` package manager to install the `nvhpc` compiler (version 21.3) with the `gcc` compiler (version 11.2.0) and the `mpi` variant. It is running on a `slurm` scheduler and utilizing specific resource requirements like nodes, tasks, CPUs, time, partition, and account.
